Package org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers

Class OID4VCGeneratedIdMapper

java.lang.Object
org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers.OID4VCMapper
org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers.OID4VCGeneratedIdMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
OID4VCEnvironmentProviderFactory, ProtocolMapper, ConfiguredProvider, EnvironmentDependentProviderFactory, Provider, ProviderFactory<ProtocolMapper>
public class OID4VCGeneratedIdMapper extends OID4VCMapper
Adds a generated ID to the credential (as a configurable property).
Author:
Ingrid Kamga
